${modID}:pingForRun.NAME: Ping For Run
${modID}:pingForRun.FLAVOR: A simple and effective way to signal the beginning of a run.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, add a random Attack and Skill from your draw pile to your hand.

${modID}:GreatSpireCollabRun.NAME: Great Spire Collab Run
${modID}:GreatSpireCollabRun.FLAVOR: Too many cooks do not spoil the broth, or perhaps 10 isn't too many.
DESCRIPTIONS: .[] NL At the start of each turn, draw 2 cards and discard 1 card.

${modID}:InfectedBalloon.NAME: Infected Balloon
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain #b2 Temporary #yStrength and #b2 Temporary #yDexterity.

${modID}:PyroChamber.NAME: Pyro Chamber
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain 1 #yStasis slot. NL Whenever a card leaves #yStasis, apply #b4 #ySoulburn to ALL enemies.

${modID}:Flywheel.NAME: Flywheel
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, #yAccelerate.

${modID}:StolenSpyglass.NAME: Stolen Spyglass
${modID}:StolenSpyglass.FLAVOR: Stolen as it was stolen before.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time each turn you play a #yDead #yOn card, gain [E].

${modID}:TheWhiteMothsEmbrace.NAME: The White Moth's Embrace
${modID}:TheWhiteMothsEmbrace.FLAVOR: The Radiance only ever wanted to be loved...
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Your #yInfection doesn't decrease at the end of your turn.

${modID}:CarbonsSkillbook.NAME: Carbon's Skillbook
${modID}:CarbonsSkillbook.FLAVOR: Filled with pages upon pages of nonsense strings of text.
DESCRIPTIONS: ALL cards cost 1, except for X cost and #yUnplayable cards. NL Future card rewards have #b1 additional card to choose from. NL Upon pickup, obtain a Prismatic Shard.
